general.serviceName: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK Account

phaseBanner.content: This is a new service – your {{-openLink}}feedback{{-closeLink}} will help us to improve it. // {{ target  }} //

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on GOV.UK Account
cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on GOV.UK Account
cookieBanner.paragraph1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.paragraph2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

cookeBannerAccept.paragraph1: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can

cookeBannerReject.paragraph1: You’ve rejected additional cookies. You can

cookie.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

content.paragraph1: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
content.paragraph2: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.

error500.title: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
error500.header: Sorry, there is a problem with the service

content.paragraph1: You’ve been signed out because you did not use your account for 30 minutes or more.
content.paragraph2: This is to keep your account and your information secure.

manageYourAccount.title: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK Account

deleteAccount.heading: Delete your account
deleteAccount.info: You can delete this account and all the information stored in it.

enterPassword.title: Enter your password
enterPassword.changeEmailParagraph1: We need to make sure it's you before you can change your email address.

dontWantTo.changeEmailLinkText: I don't want to change my email address

validationError.length: Email address must be 256 characters or fewer
validationError.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

dontWantTo.changeEmailLinkText: I don't want to change my email address

updateEmailConfirmation.title: You have changed your email address
updateEmailConfirmation.panelText: You have changed your email address
updateEmailConfirmation.summaryText: Your email address has been changed to:

deleteAccount.title: Remove account
deleteAccount.header: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.paragraph: Deleting your GOV.UK account won't delete other government accounts you may have, such as Government Gateway or your Universal Credit account.
deleteAccount.doNotDeleteAccount: I do not want to delete my account

deleteAccountConfirmed.title: Account removed
deleteAccountConfirmed.header: You have deleted your GOV.UK account
deleteAccountConfirmed.paragraph: If you need to use a GOV.UK account in future, you'll need to create one.
